work.position: Information Security and Application Development Intern
highlights: Supported the information security team: monitored SIEM alarms, and helped create policies and enforce a strong security posture
Supported the application development team: added front end and back end security to internal APIs and applications, including using Azure Active Directory authentication
Developed Vue components for the progressive web application, including dynamic views, and navigation components
Automated database migration from Google Sheets to Firebase Firestore using Python
Made stylistic recommendations to improve the user experience
Developed and deployed the Wordpress website
Customized ecommerce plugins to work with the payment gateway
Taught the basics of computer hardware
Taught the fundamentals of programming with Scratch
